name: Rune Words Unlocked
description: Enables Rune Words to work on more items
author: Shadedness

config.name: Enable ladder runewords
config.description: Enable ladder-only runewords to be available in offline games.

config.name: No weapon restrictions
config.description: Enable to allow any weapon rune word to work in all weapons.

config.name: No shield restrictions
config.description: Enable to allow any shield rune word to work in all shield types.

config.name: Shield runewords on armor
config.description: Enable to allow shield runewords to work in armor. If 'No shield restrictions' enabled, this will also include Paladin Shield runewords.

config.name: Armor runewords on shields
config.description: Enable to allow armor runewords to work in shields.

config.name: Helm runewords on shields
config.description: Enable to allow helm runewords to work in shields.

config.name: No armor restrictions
config.description: Enable to allow any armor or helm rune word to work in all armor types. You'll need a separate mod to enable sockets in other item types.
